text: WBIB-FM (89.1 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Forsyth, Georgia. The station is owned by Believers in Broadcasting, Inc., and airs a Christian format. The station was assigned the WBIB-FM call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on March 25, 2008. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * BIB-FM Category:Radio stations established in 2011 Category:2011 establishments in Georgia (U.S. state) BIB- FM Category:Monroe County, Georgia
title: WBIB-FM
